column5: hey guys i've always gone fishing on the credit river as a kid with my family however now that i have my license and going on my own fishing do salmon spawn in the spring time like steelhead or are they only retricted to the fall time?
salmon spawn in fall trout (stealhead) in spring
Salmon Spawn in the fall time. Steelhead will spawn in the spring.

rainbow trout spawn from early spring to early summer brown trout, brook trout and all the salmons spawn in the fall rainbow trout DO NOT SPAWN IN THE FALL ive been fishing them a long time and it doesnt happen. maybe a stocker rainbow thats half retarded might have loose eggs in the fall but that doesnt mean anything. i have caught rainbows in july in the middle of lake O with loose roe...

salmon start making there way into the credit around the second weekend in septemper  depending on rainfall   some steelhead will begiin the journy into the credit near the end of october into november and you will be able to catch steelhead from then on untill may
LOL  those poor stockers:clapping:  Loose roe? Does that mean she is permiscuious??  -R-
....I know of bright Kings running in the spring with loose roe in certain Ontario rivers. I've also encountered and seen plenty of fall spawning rainbows, go figure.
Oh God , please don't even ginx it....I don't think i could handle the stench for both seasons !!!  Unless the rise from the dead, i dunno how it could be possible, LOL
